channel.title: Comments on: The School of Hard Knocks In Session

item.title: By: thecheesypoofs
item.dc:creator: thecheesypoofs
item.description:
Must ... not ... answer ... trick .... question .... must ... resist ... temptation ... guildbank ...
*pop*
Oh sure I have a great deal of experience in ...
GOD DAMN, I felt for it !
item.content:encoded:
Must … not … answer … trick …. question …. must … resist … temptation … guildbank …

*pop*

Oh sure I have a great deal of experience in …

GOD DAMN, I felt for it !

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Funny you should ask, we're looking to turn over guildbank control to a fresh recruit. Any experience with that?
item.content:encoded: Funny you should ask, we’re looking to turn over guildbank control to a fresh recruit. Any experience with that?

item.title: By: thecheesypoofs
item.dc:creator: thecheesypoofs
item.description: Where can I apply to join your guild ? I'm a Rogue veteran and I have a Warrior ALT and ... and ... Doooooooh !
item.content:encoded: Where can I apply to join your guild ? I’m a Rogue veteran and I have a Warrior ALT and … and … Doooooooh !

item.title: By: Saylah
item.dc:creator: Saylah
item.description:
Gold as always. I also smile when I see the guild drama posts. It's not just that they are funny and leave you wondering if these people walk and chew gum in real life, it's Foton's telling of the tale that tips the scale to hilarious!
I always smile and it makes my night, since that's when I visit my favorite blogs. Even when my WOW life was good it was boring in comparison.
item.content:encoded:
Gold as always. I also smile when I see the guild drama posts. It’s not just that they are funny and leave you wondering if these people walk and chew gum in real life, it’s Foton’s telling of the tale that tips the scale to hilarious!

I always smile and it makes my night, since that’s when I visit my favorite blogs. Even when my WOW life was good it was boring in comparison.

item.title: By: nordee
item.dc:creator: nordee
item.description: Because comedy is tragedy... plus time.

item.title: By: Indy
item.dc:creator: Indy
item.description: Well, we play the games for entertainment, and drama is entertaining... at least when it's not happening to you, and even then it can be, usually after some time has passed.
item.content:encoded: Well, we play the games for entertainment, and drama is entertaining… at least when it’s not happening to you, and even then it can be, usually after some time has passed.

item.title: By: Random Poster
item.dc:creator: Random Poster
item.description: No not really. Oddly enough it was reports of some of the more infamous WoW drama a year or two back that eventually got me to try the trial.
item.content:encoded: No not really. Oddly enough it was reports of some of the more infamous WoW drama a year or two back that eventually got me to try the trial.

item.title: By: DM Osbon
item.dc:creator: DM Osbon
item.description: I've been away from WoW for 4 months now & am planning my return this week (<a href="http://sweetflag.wordpress.com"/ rel="nofollow">see my blog for details</a>) but reading a post like this encourages me to return more than dissuades me...am I ill!?
item.content:encoded: I’ve been away from WoW for 4 months now & am planning my return this week (see my blog for details) but reading a post like this encourages me to return more than dissuades me…am I ill!?

item.title: By: Random Poster
item.dc:creator: Random Poster
item.description: When I see one of these drama posts I always get so happy. I know it's always going ot be funny, and I know exactly how foton feels about some of these types of players (Emo tanks especially..why that class seems to breed them I don't know).
item.content:encoded: When I see one of these drama posts I always get so happy. I know it’s always going ot be funny, and I know exactly how foton feels about some of these types of players (Emo tanks especially..why that class seems to breed them I don’t know).
